item.title: 澳大利亚 HealthCo 公司称 HMC Capital 是 Healthscope 医院的收购者之一
item.description: 澳大利亚 HealthCo Healthcare and Wellness 房地产投资信托基金周五表示，由 David Di Pilla 的 HMC Capital 牵头的一个财团已就收购 Healthscope 医院的可能性与其进行了接洽。【原文：Australia's HealthCo Healthcare and Wellness REIT said on Friday that a consortium led by David Di Pilla's HMC Capital had approached it for a possible buyout of Healthscope hospitals.】

item.title: 台湾环球晶圆（GlobalWafers）称未收到有关美国补贴变化的通知
item.description: 台湾环球晶圆公司首席执行官 Doris Hsu 周五表示，该公司尚未收到任何通知，表明美国《CHIPS 法案》规定的补贴协议即将修改。【原文：Taiwan's GlobalWafers has not received any notifications indicating upcoming modifications to agreed subsidies under the U.S. CHIPS Act, CEO Doris Hsu said on Friday.】

item.title: 柏金包制造商爱马仕年末销售额大增
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团爱马仕（Hermes）周五公布的第四季度销售额增长了18%，显示出富裕购物者对最昂贵的奢侈品（如售价高达1万美元的Birkin包）的旺盛需求。【原文：French luxury group Hermes reported an 18% rise in fourth quarter sales on Friday, showing robust appetite from wealthy shoppers for the most expensive luxury items like its Birkin bags, which cost upwards of $10,000.】

item.title: 高盛上调 12 个月 STOXX 600 指数预期
item.description: 周五，高盛（Goldman Sachs）上调了欧洲 STOXX 600 指数 12 个月的价格预期，称风险溢价降低、能源价格下降、消费者信心增强和经济增长强劲等因素是主要推动力。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised its 12-month price forecast for Europe's STOXX 600 index on Friday, citing factors such as lower risk premium, reduced energy prices, improved consumer confidence, and stronger economic growth as the key drivers.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，习近平将主持马云和其他中国商界领袖出席的座谈会
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，中国国家主席习近平计划于下周主持召开一次座谈会，以提振私营部门的情绪，包括阿里巴巴联合创始人马云在内的中国商界领袖将出席此次会议。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping plans to chair a symposium to boost private sector sentiment next week that will be attended by the country's business leaders including Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma, three people with knowledge of the meeting said.】

item.title: 卡地亚所有者历峰集团任命珠宝业老板进入执行董事会
item.description: 奢侈品公司历峰集团（Richemont）周五宣布了其高级管理层的变动，珠宝公司卡地亚（Cartier）和梵克雅宝（Van Cleef）的老板将加入其执行委员会。【原文：Luxury company Richemont on Friday announced changes to its senior management, with the bosses of jewellery companies Cartier and Van Cleef joining its executive committee.】

item.title: 法国赛峰集团上调公司业绩展望，因航空运输增加了2024年利润
item.description: 法国喷气发动机制造商赛峰集团周五上调了【原文：French jet engine maker Safran on Friday revised up】

item.title: 早间竞标：关税担忧减弱，爱马仕财报待发
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，快时尚公司Shein的首次公开募股（IPO）将被推迟
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关闭了所谓的 "微不足道"（de minimis）规则，快速时尚集团Shein在英国股市上市的计划很可能被推迟到今年下半年。【原文：Fast-fashion group Shein's plans to list in the UK stock market are likely to be pushed to the second-half of this year after Donald Trump's move to close so-called "de minimis" rules, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 市场需要德国大选将带来支出增长的说服力
item.description: 下周德国将进行投票，投资者发出的信息很明确：德国是唯一一个有空间增加支出以促进经济增长的大型经济体，如果它选择这样做，也不会受到金融市场的惩罚。【原文：As Germany heads to the polls next week, the message from investors is clear: it is the one big economy with room to spend more to boost growth and it won't be punished by financial markets if it chooses to do so.】

item.title: Eneos 旨在通过金属部门 IPO 筹集多达 30 亿美元资金
item.description: 周五提交的一份监管文件显示，日本 Eneos 控股公司全资拥有的金属部门 JX Advanced Metals（JXAM）获准以 30 亿美元的股票发行价上市，这将是日本七年来最大的一次 IPO。【原文：JX Advanced Metals (JXAM), a wholly owned metals unit of Japan's Eneos Holdings , won approval to list its shares in a $3 billion share offering, a regulatory filing showed on Friday, in what would be the nation's biggest IPO in seven years.】

item.title: 纽约时报》称，Airbnb 联合创始人乔-格比亚将在马斯克的 DOGE 公司任职
item.description: 纽约时报》周四援引知情人士的话称，Airbnb 联合创始人乔-格比亚（Joe Gebbia）将与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）一起加入政府效率部。【原文：Airbnb co-founder Joe Gebbia is joining the Department of Government Efficiency along with Elon Musk, the New York Times said on Thursday, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司计划从 5 月起在中国推出人工智能功能
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道称，苹果公司的目标是最早于 5 月在中国推出人工智能功能。【原文：Apple aims to launch its artificial intelligence features in China as early as May, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，中国比亚迪拥有巴西锂谷的开采权
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的公开记录，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪于 2023 年在巴西锂资源丰富的地区获得了两块土地的采矿权，进军其在中国以外最大市场的采矿业务。【原文：Chinese electric carmaker BYD acquired mineral rights for two plots of land in a lithium-rich part of Brazil in 2023, entering the mining business in its biggest market outside of China, according to public records reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 燃料需求增长，石油将结束三周连跌
item.description: 周五早盘，油价上涨，将结束三周连跌，原因是燃料需求上升，而且人们预期特朗普的全球互惠关税计划要到四月才会生效，从而有更多时间避免贸易战。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Friday, set to snap a three-week losing streak, amid rising fuel demand and expectations that Trump's plans for reciprocal global tariffs would not come into effect until April, giving more time to avoid a trade war.】

item.title: 百度将从 6 月底开始开源 Ernie 人工智能模型
item.description: 中国百度周五表示，将从 6 月 30 日起开源下一代人工智能模型 Ernie。【原文：China's Baidu said on Friday that it would make the next-generation artificial intelligence model Ernie open-source from June 30.】

item.title: 主要货币保持稳定，市场对 PPI 乐观程度和关税进行了评估
item.description: 美元和主要货币周五保持稳定，因为交易商评估了华盛顿不会立即实施的对等关税的潜在影响，而美国生产者价格报告则缓解了对通货膨胀的担忧。【原文：The U.S. dollar and major currencies steadied on Friday, as traders assessed the potential impact of Washington's reciprocal tariffs which will not be immediately implemented, while a U.S. producer price report eased inflation concerns.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国消费者监督机构将裁员范围扩大到试用期员工之外
item.description: 据五位消息人士透露，美国消费者金融保护局周四又有一类员工收到了解聘通知，这表明特朗普政府在解雇联邦工作人员时，已经超出了试用期员工的范围。【原文：A new category of employees at the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau received termination notices on Thursday, according to five sources and termination letters, in a sign that the Trump administration was going beyond probationary employees as it looks to fire federal staff.】

item.title: 报道巨人队希望出售球队有限股份
item.description: 据《体育商业杂志》（Sports Business Journal）周四报道，纽约巨人队正在将球队的有限股份投入市场，这一过程很可能会创下 NFL 特许经营权估值的纪录。【原文：The New York Giants are putting a limited stake in the team on the market, with the process likely to set a record for an NFL franchise valuation, Sports Business Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本称正就互惠关税计划与美国沟通
item.description: 日本政府发言人周五表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令制定关税提案计划后，日本已开始与美国进行沟通。【原文：Japan has already initiated communication with the United States following President Donald Trump's order on formulating plans for tariff proposal, a government spokesperson said on Friday.】

item.title: 伯克希尔出售部分 DaVita 股份，持股比例降至 45
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周四晚间表示，已出售 203,091 股 DaVita 公司股票，将其在这家肾透析服务提供商的持股降至约 3589 万股，持股比例为 45%，价值近 64 亿美元。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway said on Thursday night it sold 203,091 shares of DaVita , reducing its stake in the kidney dialysis services provider to about 35.89 million shares, a 45% stake worth nearly $6.4 billion.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：司法部长致函苹果公司后，苹果将恢复 TikTok 在美国应用商店的销售
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道称，根据美国司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）的指示，苹果公司将于周四恢复字节跳动公司（ByteDance）旗下 TikTok 在美国应用商店的销售。【原文：Apple will restore ByteDance-owned TikTok on its U.S. App Store on Thursday following a directive from U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，汇丰银行将于 2 月 19 日公布 15 亿美元的年度成本节约计划
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，汇丰银行准备在 2 月 19 日报告其广泛重组计划所实施的变革每年可节约成本 15 亿美元。【原文：HSBC is preparing to report $1.5 billion of annual cost savings from the changes implemented under its broad restructuring initiatives on February 19, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 台湾承诺与美国进行芯片谈判并增加投资以讨好特朗普
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德周五承诺，将与美国就唐纳德-特朗普总统对芯片产业的担忧进行会谈，并增加对美国的投资和采购，同时增加国防开支。【原文：Taiwan President Lai Ching-te pledged on Friday to talk with the United States about President Donald Trump's concerns over the chip industry and to invest more in and buy more from the country, while ramping up defence spending.】

item.title: 美国卫生部长称应鼓励麦当劳在巨无霸中使用牛脂
item.description: 美国卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪周四告诉福克斯新闻，麦当劳在制作巨无霸汉堡时应该使用牛脂。【原文：U.S. Health and Human Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. told Fox News on Thursday McDonald's ought to be incentivized to use beef tallow when making its Big Mac burgers.】

item.title: 索尼股票因买单过多而无法交易
item.description: 索尼公司周五在东京的早盘交易中，在这家科技和娱乐企业集团公布了其游戏和音乐部门的强劲业绩后，其股票在大量买单下没有成交。【原文：Sony's shares were untraded with a glut of buy orders in early trading in Tokyo on Friday after the technology and entertainment conglomerate reported strong results at its games and music divisions.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司预测 2025 年核心利润高于分析师预期
item.description: 加拿大航空公司周五预测，2025 年的核心利润将高于分析师的预期，因为这家加拿大最大的航空公司押注于稳定的国际旅游需求和商务预订的反弹。【原文：Air Canada forecast 2025 core profit above analysts' estimates on Friday, as the country's largest carrier bets on steady international travel demand and a rebound in business bookings.】

item.title: 莫迪表示美印两国的目标是到 2030 年双边贸易额达到 5000 亿美元
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周四表示，美国和印度已经制定了到2030年将双边贸易额翻番至5000亿美元的目标，并将致力于尽快达成互惠贸易协定。【原文：Indian Prime Minster Narendra Modi said on Thursday the United States and India have set a target of doubling their bilateral trade to $500 billion by 2030 and will work on concluding a mutually beneficial trade agreement very soon.】

item.title: 特朗普称印度同意购买更多美国石油和天然气
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示，美国和印度已达成一项协议，其中包括印度进口更多的美国石油和天然气，以缩小两国之间的贸易逆差。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Thursday the U.S. and India have struck an agreement that includes India importing more U.S. oil and gas to shrink the trade deficit between the two countries.】

item.title: 网络卡车车祸为特斯拉自动驾驶软件敲响警钟
item.description: 在首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示将于今年推出付费机器人出租车服务几天后，本周发生了一起特斯拉 Cybertruck 在自动驾驶模式下撞车事故，引发了人们对该公司为该功能提供动力的软件的可靠性的担忧。【原文：A crash involving a Tesla Cybertruck in self-driving mode this week has sparked worries about the reliability of the company's software that powers the feature, days after CEO Elon Musk said he would roll out a paid robotaxi service this year.】
